name: IQ Software Services
description:
IQSS is the leading independent provider of consulting and solutions for ECM and Compliance. We have helped our customers across different regions automate processes, empower employees to deliver increased productivity, service levels and business performance while reducing operational costs. IQSS provide technology consulting and services on emerging technologies.
With a proven track record of successful client engagements, technical expertise in major platforms we are uniquely positioned to address any business challenge with speed, resolve, and a seamless global delivery model.
READ MORE...
